name: Beacon (itch) (Jacob Speicher)
description:
Beacon is a game created in 2 weeks for the /r/IndieDev Mix Tape #1 located at reddit.com.

It is the story of people on a planet that stopped rotating, and the ships that followed their beacons.

It was completed on March 23, 2015 by Jacob Speicher (paetramon)

Updated on March 27, 2015
